extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Splunk Enterprise system is running a version before 8.1.2 and if Splunkweb is enabled.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Splunk Enterprise
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Splunk Enterprise to version 8.1.2 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Splunkweb
extracted_playbook.description: Disable Splunkweb to mitigate the vulnerability. Refer to Securing Splunk Enterprise and Splunk Enterprise administration manuals for detailed instructions.
